text.body:
itu pirivuṇarttappaṭṭu āṟṟāḷāya talaivi emmaiyum uṭaṉ-koṇṭu ceṉmiṉeṉṟāṭku uṭaṉpaṭātu avaṉ piriyaluṟat taṉatu iṟantupāṭutōṉṟak kūṟiyatu.
ilaṅkoḷi maruppiṟ kaimmā vuḷampunar
pulaṅkaṭi kavaṇaiyiṟ pūñciṉai yutirkku
milaṅkumalai vempiya pōkkaru veñcuran
taṉiyē yiṟappa yāṉoḻin tirutta
ṉakutaṟ koṉṟiv vaḻuṅka lūrkkē;
iṉiyāṉ,
uṇṇalu muṇṇēṉ vāḻalum vāḻēṉ;
tōṇala muṇṭu tuṟakkap paṭṭōr
vēṇī ruṇṭa kuṭaiyō raṉṉar;
nalkunar purintu nalaṉuṇap paṭṭō
ralkunar pōkiya vūrō raṉṉar;
kūṭiṉar purintu kuṇaṉuṇap paṭṭōr
cūṭiṉa riṭṭa pūvō raṉṉar;
eṉavāṅku,
yāṉu niṉṉakat taṉaiyē ṉāṉātu
kolaiveṅ koḷkaiyoṭu nāyakap paṭuppa
valaivark kamarnta maṭamāṉ pōla
niṉṉāṅku varūumeṉ ṉeñciṉai
yeṉṉāṅku vārā tōmpiṉai koṇmē.
COPY STANDOFF FROM INTERFACE HERE
